trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There was one other sighting in Toronto on or around March 13th 2008
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Fri, Mar 14, 2008 at 2:12 AM, Ameet Asrani wrote: Hello There At 11:45 pm i was looking outside my balcony and saw at a distance a red flashing object looked more like a star from far i looked at it constantly for 10 minutes and then realized the light was getting bigger like the object was coming closer.It was Red and Yellow flashes.After another 10 minutes i saw it moving very slowly from North East direction to North West Direction and lights got smaller and went sideways.The ufo was stable for 30 minutes at its position.I then went down and found couple of people down and showed them the light.They were also suprised as they had not seen something like this before none of us had a camera a video cam.I then came back back up to appartment.At 11:50 am i contacted the UFO REPORTING CENTRE in washington and filed a report there.At 1:22 am the object has moved north west and the lights went smaller and smaller and sideways stopping every 2 mintues in one position until it went pretty further away for me to see it .If you want the image of this object my best suggestion would be to take satellite photos at the precise time i saw this.You might able to pull some images.This is my first encounter with something like this and will never forget this day and sighting for the rest of my life.You can contact me at 647 989 6110 my name is AMEET ASRANI.
